TopicTitle: [FORUM GAME] Choose next person to post (new rules)

  • [li]First you post this silly idea[/li]
    [li]Then you make me respond to it in a silly way![/li]

Next person will use a marquee to respond.
[move]Yes, thats me! To Caesar, I\'m 5\'4'. Next person to post will be someone with words, spoilers, and images in their signature.[/move]
